channel.title: Loss Models on Katrien Antonio
channel.description: Recent content in Loss Models on Katrien Antonio

item.title: Loss modelling analytics
item.description: An overview of published research papers within the loss modelling analytics research line developed in my lab. This research line puts focus on mixture models for a global fit of attritional losses spliced models for a global fit of both attritional and large losses. Modelling censored losses using splicing: a global fit strategy with mixed Erlang and extreme value distributions Collaborators: Tom Reynkens, Roel Verbelen, Jan Beirlant and Katrien Antonio.
